languages.text: Once per combat, if the incoming damage is fatal for the Cyber-Eagle, it uses {g|f:d8ae4229d77d444fa3bff7e2817541b3}Ascend{/g} automatically thus cheating death.

traits.locale_text: Once per combat, if the incoming damage is fatal for the Cyber-Eagle, it uses {g|f:d8ae4229d77d444fa3bff7e2817541b3}Ascend{/g} automatically thus cheating death.

languages.text: When the cyber-eagle suffers lethal damage for the first time in combat, it remains in combat and immediately {g|f:d8ae4229d77d444fa3bff7e2817541b3}soars{/g}, regaining 33% of its {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}.
languages.original_text: Когда киберорел впервые за бой получает смертельный урон, он остается в строю, восстановив 33% от своего {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}максимального здоровья{/g}, и немедленно поднимается {g|f:d8ae4229d77d444fa3bff7e2817541b3}в воздух{/g}.

traits.locale_text: When the cyber-eagle suffers {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethal{/g} damage for the first time in combat, it remains in combat and immediately {g|f:d8ae4229d77d444fa3bff7e2817541b3}soars{/g}, regaining 33% of its {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}.

When the cyber-eagle suffers lethal damage for the first time in combat, it remains in combat and immediately {g|f:d8ae4229d77d444fa3bff7e2817541b3}soars{/g}, regaining 33% of its {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}.

When the cyber-eagle suffers lethal damage for the first time in combat, it remains in combat and immediately {g|f:d8ae4229d77d444fa3bff7e2817541b3}soars{/g}, regaining 33% of its {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}.

languages.text: Siber kartal, çatışmada ilk kez ölümcül hasara maruz kaldığında çatışmada kalır ve anında {g|f:d8ae4229d77d444fa3bff7e2817541b3}yükselerek{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maksimum sağlık{/g} puanının %33'ünü geri kazanır.
languages.original_text: When the cyber-eagle suffers lethal damage for the first time in combat, it remains in combat and immediately {g|f:d8ae4229d77d444fa3bff7e2817541b3}soars{/g}, regaining 33% of its {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Siber kartal, çatışmada ilk kez ölümcül hasara maruz kaldığında çatışmada kalır ve anında {g|f:d8ae4229d77d444fa3bff7e2817541b3}yükselerek{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maksimum sağlık{/g} puanının %33'ünü geri kazanır.
Siber kartal, çatışmada ilk kez ölümcül hasara maruz kaldığında çatışmada kalır ve anında {g|f:d8ae4229d77d444fa3bff7e2817541b3}yükselerek{/g} maksimum sağlık puanının %33'ünü geri kazanır.

languages.text: La première fois que le cyber-aigle subit des dégâts mortels, il continue le combat et {g|f:d8ae4229d77d444fa3bff7e2817541b3}s'envole{/g} immédiatement en récupérant 33 % de ses {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}blessures maximum{/g}.
languages.original_text: When the cyber-eagle suffers lethal damage for the first time in combat, it remains in combat and immediately {g|f:d8ae4229d77d444fa3bff7e2817541b3}soars{/g}, regaining 33% of its {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: La première fois que le cyber-aigle subit des dégâts mortels, il continue le combat et {g|f:d8ae4229d77d444fa3bff7e2817541b3}s'envole{/g} immédiatement en récupérant 33 % de ses blessures maximum.

languages.text: Wenn der Cyber-Adler zum ersten Mal im Kampf tödlichen Schaden erleidet, bliebt er im Kampf und {g|f:d8ae4229d77d444fa3bff7e2817541b3}steigt{/g} sofort auf, wobei er 33 % seiner {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximalen Wunden{/g} regeneriert.
languages.original_text: When the cyber-eagle suffers lethal damage for the first time in combat, it remains in combat and immediately {g|f:d8ae4229d77d444fa3bff7e2817541b3}soars{/g}, regaining 33% of its {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Wenn der Cyber-Adler zum ersten Mal im Kampf tödlichen Schaden erleidet, bliebt er im Kampf und {g|f:d8ae4229d77d444fa3bff7e2817541b3}steigt{/g} sofort auf, wobei er 33 % seiner maximalen Wunden regeneriert.

languages.text: サイバーイーグルが戦闘で初めて致命的なダメージを受けた場合、戦闘から離脱せず即座に{g|f:d8ae4229d77d444fa3bff7e2817541b3}舞い上がり{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大の傷{/g}の33%を回復する。
languages.original_text: When the cyber-eagle suffers lethal damage for the first time in combat, it remains in combat and immediately {g|f:d8ae4229d77d444fa3bff7e2817541b3}soars{/g}, regaining 33% of its {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: サイバーイーグルが戦闘で初めて致命的なダメージを受けた場合、戦闘から離脱せず即座に{g|f:d8ae4229d77d444fa3bff7e2817541b3}舞い上がり{/g}、最大の傷の33%を回復する。
サイバーイーグルが戦闘で初めて致命的なダメージを受けた場合、戦闘から離脱せず即座に{g|f:d8ae4229d77d444fa3bff7e2817541b3}舞い上がり{/g}、最大の傷の33%を回復する。

traits.locale_text: Когда киберорел впервые за бой получает смертельный урон, он остается в строю, восстановив 33% от своего {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}максимального здоровья{/g}, и немедленно поднимается {g|f:d8ae4229d77d444fa3bff7e2817541b3}в воздух{/g}.

Когда киберорел впервые за бой получает смертельный урон, он остается в строю, восстановив 33% от своего {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}максимального здоровья{/g}, и немедленно поднимается {g|f:d8ae4229d77d444fa3bff7e2817541b3}в воздух{/g}.

languages.text: 当生化猎鹰在每场战斗中首次承受致命伤害时，它会继续进行战斗，立刻{g|f:d8ae4229d77d444fa3bff7e2817541b3}腾空{/g}，同时恢复{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大生命值{/g}的33%。
languages.original_text: When the cyber-eagle suffers lethal damage for the first time in combat, it remains in combat and immediately {g|f:d8ae4229d77d444fa3bff7e2817541b3}soars{/g}, regaining 33% of its {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 当生化猎鹰在每场战斗中首次承受致命伤害时，它会继续进行战斗，立刻{g|f:d8ae4229d77d444fa3bff7e2817541b3}腾空{/g}，同时恢复最大生命值的33%。

languages.text: Cuando la ciberáguila sufre daño letal por primera vez en combate, permanece en combate y {g|f:d8ae4229d77d444fa3bff7e2817541b3}se eleva{/g} de inmediato, recuperando el 33 % de sus {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}heridas máximas{/g}.
